mapper.select: select * from worldlist where recipe_name like concat('%', #{recipe_name}, '%') and userid = #{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO worldlist ( recipe_name, main_ingredient, ingredients, cooking_order, prep_time, difficulty_level, category, userid, cnt, regdate ) VALUES ( #{recipe_name}, #{main_ingredient}, #{ingredients}, #{cooking_order}, #{prep_time}, #{difficulty_level}, #{category}, #{userid}, #{cnt}, NOW() );
mapper.update: UPDATE worldlist SET recipe_name = #{recipe_name}, main_ingredient = #{main_ingredient}, ingredients = #{ingredients}, cooking_order = #{cooking_order}, prep_time = #{prep_time}, difficulty_level = #{difficulty_level}, category = #{category} WHERE id = #{id};
